issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Fix homebrew-cpp again, again
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9596](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9596). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java

Error: 1 problem in 1 formula detected
apache-arrow:
  * C: 7: col 47: Use the new Ruby 1.9 hash syntax.
The command "brew audit $ARROW_FORMULA" failed and exited with 1 during .
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9596?focusedCommentId=17167540) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7860
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7860>
